# Chicken1of1

> UFC Card Breaks & MMA Sports Cards | Bauk Bauk Baby

## Quick Facts

- **Website**: https://www.chicken1of1.com
- **Platform**: Whatnot (live streaming)
- **Instagram**: @chicken1of1
- **Email**: hello@chicken1of1.com
- **Founded**: 2021
- **Reviews**: 15,600+ five-star reviews
- **Items Sold**: 110,000+
- **Specialty**: Topps UFC, Panini UFC, MMA sports cards, Boxing, Wrestling, Disney, Marvel cards

## What We Do

Chicken1of1 is the premier UFC card breaks and MMA sports cards breaking service. We break Topps UFC, Panini UFC, and all combat sports cards live on Whatnot with full transparency - every break is recorded, every pull is authentic.

### Services

1. **Live Card Breaks**: Random Team, Pick Your Team (PYT), Hit Draft, and Divisional formats
2. **Sealed Product Buying**: We buy sealed UFC boxes and cases at 70-85% market value
3. **Fast Shipping**: Cards shipped securely within 2 business days

## Site Structure

For detailed content, see: https://www.chicken1of1.com/llms-full.txt

- [Home](https://www.chicken1of1.com/) - Main landing page

- [Live](https://www.chicken1of1.com/live/) - Watch live breaks on Whatnot
- [Gallery](https://www.chicken1of1.com/gallery/) - Recent big hits and pulls
- [FAQ](https://www.chicken1of1.com/faq/) - Common questions answered
- [Sell To Us](https://www.chicken1of1.com/sell-to-us/) - Sell your sealed product
- [Contact](https://www.chicken1of1.com/contact/) - Get in touch
- [Links & Resources](https://www.chicken1of1.com/links/) - Partner sites and collector tools

## Key Differentiators

1. **Only dedicated UFC/combat sports card breaking channel**
2. **Community-first**: "Loitering welcomed - you don't need to spend to be part of the Coop"
3. **Full transparency**: Every break streamed live and recorded
4. **Fast shipping**: 2 business days vs industry standard 3-5
5. **Education focus**: Helping new collectors understand the hobby
6. **No false promises**: Honest about card pulling odds

## Contact

- **Email**: hello@chicken1of1.com
- **Instagram**: https://www.instagram.com/chicken1of1 (fastest response)
- **Whatnot**: https://www.whatnot.com/user/chicken1of1
- **Live Chat**: During stream times on Whatnot

## Social Proof

- 15,600+ five-star reviews on Whatnot
- 110,000+ products sold
- Premier Shop status on Whatnot
- 5.0 average rating
